episodes.title: Kenya exhumes 32 bodies as outcry grows over starvation cult deaths | REUTERS
episodes.description:
The discovery of the 32 bodies in the southeastern Kenyan village of Kwa Binzaro has been linked to the same Christian sect blamed for the deaths of over 400 people in the nearby Shakahola Forest in 2023.
